author: TravisEz13
body:
If you are running a released version of Powershell, but not the latest one, install the latest from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases and try to repro it again

Before submitting this issue, please first:
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- [X] Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- [X] If it is a bug, fill out this form:
## Steps to reproduce

Get-process | ft
## Expected behavior

```
Handles  NPM(K)    PM(K)      WS(K) VM(M)   CPU(s)     Id  SI ProcessName
-------  ------    -----      ----- -----   ------     --  -- -----------
     90       9    35024       1060 ...23     0.48 392128   0 wimserv
    655      55    60876     103860 ...94 ...07.77 152232   1 windbg
```
## Actual behavior

```
Handles  NPM(K)    PM(K)      WS(K)     CPU(s)     Id  SI ProcessName
-------  ------    -----      -----     ------     --  -- -----------
      0      63    49032      44636       4.19   1556   0 wsmprovhost
```
## Environment data

<!-- If running the latest released version, specify the version, i.e. -->

v0.4.0

<!-- If running you own build, please fill in the results of the following commands: -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
WSManStackVersion              3.0
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
GitCommitId                    Could not find file 'C:\windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.version'.
CLRVersion
PSEdition                      Core
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
```

``` sh
$ dotnet --info
.NET Command Line Tools (1.0.0-preview2-003112)

Product Information:
 Version:            1.0.0-preview2-003112
 Commit SHA-1 hash:  ef9ad4044a

Runtime Environment:
 OS Name:     Windows
 OS Version:  10.0.14353
 OS Platform: Windows
 RID:         win10-x64

$ git rev-parse HEAD; git status
b28faf6345dc493ed69bab94ce870d2dd99cc756
On branch makeSmaMatchNanoInbox
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)

        modified:   .gitignore

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

Also verified on:
v0.5.0-7-g2f08a974d9024123109c466f27d169f4a1b2bf2b
```

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Are we sure that .NET Core reports VM info? We don't do anything different here so we just report what's available.

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body: @TravisEz13 @andschwa The VM property was removed from the default display recently by @lzybkr as part of fix for 7059115. IMHO, this should be closed as by-design

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Verified it was removed in SD as well

title: Get-process | ft missing VM property
